name: Gachi Bird (Ray Dostoewsky)
description:
Hello, Jabroni , welcome to a fun game with the main characters of Gachi Muchi - "Gachi Bird"!

In this easy game you can see and play as characters who are memes, actors and generally cool people. The game is done in the style of " Gachi Muchi " to entertain you when you have an extra minute. 

Good luck and Have Fun!

This project was not meant to touch anyone's feelings or offend anyone. It was created for those who have an extra minute to have fun and enjoy this masterpiece. Start playing!

================= Update InDev 0.2.5 =================

05.04.2021

- More bugs fixed!
- New items, skins, triggers, backgrounds and more!
- New mechanik of randomize a location!
- New sounds adds (died, jump, background music, sounds)

==================================================
